topic.fieldDescription: Topic to be associated with the page.
topic.name: ./topic

tag.fieldDescription: Tag to be associated with the page.
tag.name: ./tag

hideComments.fieldDescription: To hide Comments on the page
hideComments.name: ./disableComments

noShareBar.fieldDescription: To hide Share Bar on the page
noShareBar.name: ./noShareBar

relatedContent.fieldDescription: Select to add the component to the page
relatedContent.name: ./relatedContent

publishDateOverride.fieldDescription: By default, the publish date is the CQ Activation date. An author can override in the page if that renders front end publish date.
publishDateOverride.name: ./cq:lastPublishedDate

contentType.fieldDescription: Select the type of content in the page in order to accurately render in Search Results.
contentType.name: ./contentType

notResponsive.fieldLabel: Do not re-size for mobile view?
notResponsive.name: ./notResponsive

linkType.fieldDescription: Select “internal” for link to internal cms page, “external” to an outside internet link
linkType.name: linkType

linkURL.fieldDescription: Link to an internal page or an external URL.
linkURL.name: link

contentLongTitle.fieldDescription: Enter text to be displayed instead of linked long title
contentLongTitle.name: longTitle

contentShortTitle.fieldDescription: Enter text to be displayed instead of linked short title
contentShortTitle.name: shortTitle

newWindow.fieldDescription: External page recommended to open in a new window
newWindow.name: newWindow

topicLinkType.fieldDescription: Select “internal” for link to internal cms page, “external” to an outside internet link
topicLinkType.name: linkType

topicLinkURL.fieldDescription: Link to an internal page or an external URL.
topicLinkURL.name: link

listeners.dialogselect: function() { var longTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'longTitle'); var shortTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'shortTitle'); var fieldLongTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', longTitle)[0]; var fieldShortTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', shortTitle)[0]; var titlelink = this.getValue(); $.ajaxSetup({ async: false }); $.getJSON("/apps/journey/components/common/dialogConfig/titleslist/data.json",{ link: titlelink, },function(data) { var longTitle = data.longTitle; var shortTitle = data.shortTitle; if(longTitle) { fieldLongTitle.setValue(longTitle); } if(shortTitle) { fieldShortTitle.setValue(shortTitle); } }); };
listeners.search: function() { var longTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'longTitle'); var shortTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'shortTitle'); var fieldLongTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', longTitle)[0]; var fieldShortTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', shortTitle)[0]; var titlelink = this.getValue(); $.ajaxSetup({ async: false }); $.getJSON("/apps/journey/components/common/dialogConfig/titleslist/data.json",{ link: titlelink, },function(data) { var longTitle = data.longTitle; var shortTitle = data.shortTitle; if(longTitle) { fieldLongTitle.setValue(longTitle); } if(shortTitle) { fieldShortTitle.setValue(shortTitle); } }); };
listeners.select: function() { var longTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'longTitle'); var shortTitle = this.name.replace('link', 'shortTitle'); var fieldLongTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', longTitle)[0]; var fieldShortTitle = this.findParentByType('form').find('name', shortTitle)[0]; var titlelink = this.getValue(); $.ajaxSetup({ async: false }); $.getJSON("/apps/journey/components/common/dialogConfig/titleslist/data.json",{ link: titlelink, },function(data) { var longTitle = data.longTitle; var shortTitle = data.shortTitle; if(longTitle) { fieldLongTitle.setValue(longTitle); } if(shortTitle) { fieldShortTitle.setValue(shortTitle); } }); };

topicLinkLTitle.fieldDescription: Enter text to be displayed instead of linked long title
topicLinkLTitle.name: longTitle

topicLinkSTitle.fieldDescription: Enter text to be displayed instead of linked short title
topicLinkSTitle.name: shortTitle

topicLinkNewWindow.fieldDescription: External page recommended to open in a new window
topicLinkNewWindow.name: newWindow

recommendedLinkType.fieldDescription: Select “internal” for link to internal cms page, “external” to an outside internet link
recommendedLinkType.name: linkType

recommendedLinkURL.fieldDescription: Link to an internal page or an external URL.
recommendedLinkURL.name: link
